statements: SELECT * FROM network_monitoring;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_monitoring;
SELECT id, timestamp, threat_level FROM network_monitoring WHERE data_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM network_monitoring WHERE threat_level = 'High' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, data_size FROM network_monitoring WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM network_monitoring WHERE threat_level = 'high' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, data_size FROM network_monitoring WHERE data_size > 1000 AND threat_level = 'medium' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT MAX(data_size) AS max_data_size, MIN(data_size) AS min_data_size FROM network_monitoring WHERE threat_level = 'low'
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS num_events FROM network_monitoring WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY num_events DESC
SELECT destination_ip, AVG(data_size) AS avg_data_size FROM network_monitoring GROUP BY destination_ip HAVING AVG(data_size) > 500
SELECT * FROM network_traffic;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, data_transferred FROM network_traffic;
SELECT id, destination_ip, timestamp, data_transferred, source_ip FROM network_traffic WHERE data_transferred > 1000;
SELECT id, timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT source_ip, COUNT(*) AS traffic_count FROM network_traffic GROUP BY source_ip HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic WHERE data_transferred > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip FROM network_traffic WHERE source_ip = '192.168.1.1' AND destination_ip = '10.0.0.1'
SELECT source_ip, SUM(data_transferred) AS total_data_transferred FROM network_traffic GROUP BY source_ip ORDER BY total_data_transferred DESC
SELECT timestamp, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM system_status WHERE cpu_usage > 70 OR memory_usage > 80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT AVG(cpu_usage) AS avg_cpu_usage, AVG(memory_usage) AS avg_memory_usage FROM system_status
SELECT id, source_ip, destination_ip, port, protocol, threat_level FROM network_traffic;
SELECT id, source_ip, port, destination_ip, threat_level, protocol FROM network_traffic;
SELECT timestamp, server_name, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM system_status;
SELECT id, threat_type, threat_description, threat_status, detection_time FROM security_threats;
SELECT threat_type, id, threat_description, threat_status FROM security_threats ORDER BY detection_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_traffic ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM network_traffic WHERE threat_level = 'high';
SELECT server_name, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM system_status WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM security_threats ORDER BY detection_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, threat_type, threat_status FROM security_threats WHERE threat_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM NetworkTraffic;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, port FROM NetworkTraffic WHERE protocol='TCP';
SELECT id, threat_name, severity FROM SecurityThreats ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT timestamp, memory_usage FROM SystemStatus WHERE cpu_usage > 80;
SELECT threat_id, timestamp, status FROM ThreatAlerts WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM NetworkTraffic ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT source_ip, destination_ip, protocol FROM NetworkTraffic WHERE port = 80;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreats WHERE severity = 'High' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT threat_name, description FROM SecurityThreats WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT SystemStatus.timestamp, SystemStatus.cpu_usage, SystemStatus.memory_usage FROM SystemStatus ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkTraffic ORDER BY Timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ID, SourceAddress, DestinationAddress, Protocol FROM NetworkTraffic WHERE Status = 'OK';
SELECT Hostname, CPUUsage, MemoryUsage FROM SystemStatus WHERE CPUUsage > 80 ORDER BY Timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM SecurityThreats WHERE Severity = 'High' AND Status = 'Active';
SELECT Username, Email, Role FROM Users ORDER BY Username ASC;
SELECT * FROM SystemStatus ORDER BY Timestamp DESC, CPUUsage ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT SourceAddress, DestinationAddress, COUNT(*) AS NumRecords FROM NetworkTraffic GROUP BY SourceAddress, DestinationAddress HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT ThreatName, Severity, ThreatType FROM SecurityThreats WHERE Severity = 'High' AND Status = 'Open' ORDER BY ThreatName ASC
SELECT * FROM NetworkTraffic WHERE Protocol = 'HTTP' OR Protocol = 'HTTPS' AND Status = 'Success' ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT Username, Email, Role FROM Users WHERE Role IN ('Admin', 'Editor')
